2025-08-05T08:19:00.CONTENT_EN: The service of Central to Mid-Levels Escalator was suspended.
2025-08-05T08:19:00.CONTENT_CN: 中環⾄半⼭⾃動扶梯已暫停服務。

2025-08-05T18:10:00.CONTENT_EN: The service of Central to Mid-Levels Escalator has resumed normal.
2025-08-05T18:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 中環⾄半⼭⾃動扶梯已恢復正常服務。

2025-08-05T08:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to low visibility , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (HZMB) Main Bridge, with details as shown below: (i) The speed limit of the fast and middle lanes of HZMB Main Bridge are lowered from 100km/h to 50 km/h; and (ii) The speed limit of the slow lane of HZMB Main Bridge is lowered from 80km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-08-05T08:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於能見度低，港珠澳大橋主橋已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： (i)港珠澳大橋主橋的快線及中線車速限制由每小時100公里降至每小時50 公里；及 (ii)港珠澳大橋主橋的慢線車速限制由每小時80公里降至每小時50 公里。

2025-08-05T16:20:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that due to the adverse weather, train services during the evening peak hours would be adjusted as necessary. 
Please allow more time for travel.
2025-08-05T16:20:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，受惡劣天氣影響，傍晚繁忙時段之列車服務會按需要稍作調整，
請為行程預留充裕時間。

2025-08-05T17:22:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that The entrances/exits closed earlier have reopened.
2025-08-05T17:22:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 早前關閉的車站出入口已重新開放。

2025-08-05T19:10:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Train services during the evening period would be adjusted to facilitate your journey. 
Please allow more time for travel.
2025-08-05T19:10:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 傍晚時段的列車服務會按需要作出調整，以配合乘客出行。 
請為行程預留充裕時間。

2025-08-05T16:29:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the influence of heavy rain, the bus services arrangement are as follows: KMB and LWB Suspended: 91, 91M, 92, 94, HK1 CTB Suspended：15C, H1, H1S, H2, H3, H4 Diverted: 22M, 43M, 70, 72, 78, A25, E22 Cross-harbour bus Diverted: 106, 107, 608 For the latest service arrangement of individual bus routes, members of the public can refer to the information on the bus company's website or mobile application.
2025-08-05T16:29:00.CONTENT_CN: 因受暴雨影響，以下巴⼠服務安排如下： 九巴及龍運 暫停行駛：91,91M,92,94,HK1 城巴 暫停行駛：15C,H1,H1S,H2,H3,H4 改道行駛：22M,43M,70,72,78,A25,E22 過海巴⼠ 改道行駛：106,107,608 有關個別巴士路線的最新服務情況，市⺠可參閱巴⼠公司的網⾴或流動應⽤程式內的資訊。

2025-08-05T20:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the influence of heavy rain, the bus services arrangement are as follows: KMB and LWB Route No. 91, 91M, 92 will gradually resume service from 8:15p. m. (New Territories bound) and 8:30p. m. (Kowloon bound) onwards. Diverted: 94 CTB Bus services have resumed normal. For the latest service arrangement of individual bus routes, members of the public can refer to the information on the bus company's website or mobile application.
